title: New: Kirk Spencer – In Treatment  (Ft. Louis Scott)
content:
With Kirk Spencer’s new EP, Wonderland, due out on the 25th of March, we’ve been treated to this new blissed out electro jam that goes rather nicely with this weather we’ve been having, at least here in London.

After the wonder that was Kukcu, In Treatment comes off as the weaker track, however it’s still leaving me more than excited to hear the full release.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
